title: Update*House in Lindstrom for rent*Lawn care and snow removal included
posting_body: ['I am interviewing for potential rental of my house in Lindstrom.', ' I say interview because the fit has to be right.', ' A few  years were spent remodeling/renovating this property, everything is in near new condition.', ' It has a view of the lake.', ' Very nice 2 bedroom, 1 bath home with a large living area, dining area, kitchen, mud entry, screen, laundry downstairs and upstairs, and a 2.5 car attached garage.', ' It is about  1200ish square feet with single level living.', '  Full unfinished basement.', ' The outside has been recently painted as well.', '  Everything was new a few years ago with upgraded finishes.', ' All new Anderson windows with higher end exterior doors and hardware.', '  Bath has a nice tub/shower.', ' Subway tile, granite countertops.', ' A few of the amenities are a dishwasher, large closets in every bedroom, kitchen cabinetry has been updated with new hardware and quartz tops.', ' It is a great layout.', '  I am interested in potential renters that can align with:  Absolutely no smoking, No pets, automatic direct deposit of rent on the first of every month, initial damage deposit of two months rent, a longer term rental situation (at least 2 years).', ' Lawn and snow maintenance is included.', ' This property really fits a single person or couple very well.', ' Or, people that want to live in a single family home with the services of a townhouse if we work out that I do the maintenance.', " I would rather not have a family situation because let's face it, kids and beyond two people would put excessive pressure on this property.", ' I am also looking for tenants that will always take off their shoes, are excessively organized/clean, and will treat this place is if it were their own.', ' Water/sewer, utilities, and garbage will be the responsibility of the tenant as well.', '  A great thing about the property is that with the newer furnace, brand new central air conditioning system, hot water heater, and insulation, it is extremely efficient.', '  I think the max energy bill is like $175 in the middle of winter?', ' It is located on Olinda trail near town and walking distance to the new Community Center.', '   Near town Lindstrom living is fun!', ' Parks close, sidewalks, beaches and dining are all in close walking distance.', '  This ad may seem little harsh, but I am particular about what I am searching for because of how much time I spent on the home.', ' It still could use a landscape refresh, and would be open to talking about this you have experience and interested in doing it.', ' Please call so we can talk in person.', 'show contact info', 'Update:  Reduced price for the upstairs only.', ' Working on plans to finish the basement.', ' The upstairs is a completely isolated and contained unit with locked entrance.', '  Reduced price given the tenant must be willing to deal with some construction noise from time to time  in the basement during daytime hours, and possibly some evenings/weekends.', ' Open to chatting about it.', 'The property could be available soon as my renter just moved out.', ' Still need to do a deep clean.', 'Thank you!', 'Chisago City, Center City, Shafer, Taylors Falls, Osceola, Hazelden, Betty Ford, Polaris, Forest Lake, North Metro, Stacy, Linwood, Wyoming, North Branch, Almelund.']
